dmca.title: [ABUSE] abuse report "psyreactor.com"
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 08, 2005 10:06 AM
To: thomas@trishula-records.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] abuse report "psyreactor.com"

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Thomas (Trishula Records) <thomas@trishula-records.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Tuesday, March 8, 2005, 7:15:57 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] abuse report "psyreactor.com"

===8<==============Original message text=============== Dear Sirs and
Mesdames,

you are hosting the websites of "psyreactor.com" which are containing links
to downloads of copyrighted files and copyrighted information.
This websites are part of a network of copyrighted file piracy (in this case
linking to copyrighted music and software in the edonkey peer-2-peer
network).

We advise you to remove the sites from your servers and we are prepared to
take legal steps against any hoster and of course the owner of the websites
of "psyreactor.com".

We hope that your company will react and stop hosting websites providing
illegal content.

Regards
Thomas Christiani
Managment
Trishula Records


- ---------------------------------------------
Trishula Records
www.trishula-records.com
info@trishula-records.com
- ---------------------------------------------

===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP
SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCLc1kvK/XpJs6oyURAsE3AJ0WD+QPTkY9IfdeFEDjEPk15Od3ZQCgoyHV
9rY0QMlz4Ez6YU4ieMS4tHE=
=wUFw
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
